text: waja'at jamaeat min almsafryn, fa'arsaluu man yatlub lahum alma', falamaa 'ursil dalwah fi albyr tellaq biha ywsf, faqal wardhm: ya bshray hdha ghulam nfys, wa'akhfaa alward washabh ywsf min baqiat almusafirin falam yazharuh lhm, wqalu: 'iina hadhih bidaeatan astbdenaha, wallah ealim bima yemlwnh bywsf
